sense.gloss: area, domain, territory, field, range, region, regime
occupying, having (an area) all to oneself
general plan, main points, summary, platform (e.g. for a campaign), mission statement
receipt (of a letter, money, etc.), acceptance, receiving
characteristic quality, special character, one's real ability, one's specialty
territory, domain, dominion, possession, sphere of action
nape of the neck, scruff of the neck
counter for suits of clothing, sets of armor, etc.
provincial governor (from the middle of the Heian period)
Southern Kuril Islands (administered by Russia, claimed by Japan), Northern Territories
hairline at nape of neck, nape of neck

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑危険↑↓きけん↓な↑領域↑↓りょういき↓に↑踏↑↓ふ↓み↑込↑↓こ↓んでいるよ。

sdata.j: それは↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑領分↑↓りょうぶん↓ですよ。
sdata.e: That's my province.
